title: CHICO'S logo
content:
Women's clothing store CHICO’S: [http://tinyurl.com/5js534](http://web.archive.org/web/20141120101632/http:/tinyurl.com/5js534 "http://tinyurl.com/5js534")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141120101632im_/http:/typophile.com/files/chicos_4150.gif)

It's a squared sans serif that looks a lot like Bank Gothic, Eurostile, or Square 721. But it has pure horizontal and vertical edges that aren't curved at all, a very small corner radius, and the C and O letters are indeed square with the same height and width.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [chicos.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20141120101632/http:/typophile.com/files/chicos.gif) | 2.78 KB |
author: davidc

comments.content: looks like someone started with bank gothic and altered it... or even just drew it in illustrator from scratch, not a very difficult set of characters
